title: danbennett.dev V1
oneLine: The original design of personal website.
detail: The original design of my site. A simple landing page with links to my projects.

title: Landing Page
oneLine: Stylized landing page with animations to improve CSS skills.
detail: Stylized landing page with animations to improve CSS skills.

title: Simple Mobile Portfolio
oneLine: Basic photo and text portfolio website to practice CSS and responsive design.
detail: Basic photo and text portfolio website to practice CSS and responsive design.

title: Store Front
oneLine: CSS and HTML store front UI project.
detail: More CSS and HTML with a incrementally larger store front UI project.

title: Retro Blackjack
oneLine: First project implementing Javascript logic and DOM manipulation.
detail: My first project implementing Javascript logic and DOM manipulation.

title: Meme Generator
oneLine: Async API data calls using Vanilla Javascript.

title: danbennett.dev V2
detail: Personal website expanded and redesigned to include project cards and contact form.

title: Dividend Rate Blender
oneLine: Javascript application focusing on aysnc API calls and DOM manipulation.
detail: A bare bones venture into app development where I combined DOM manipulation, Async and JSON to display and calculate an average dividend yield for chosen stock investments.

title: Worthie
oneLine: First full-stack project personal finance tracker.(Note* AWS database hosting no longer available).
detail: Personal Finance Tracker and first full-stack project. I've been keeping track of my finances for years on a spreadsheet. This was my attempt at a more accessible web based version. Note-my sample data from the test login only extends to March 2022, but the app will load on the current month, so to view test data you need to switch the date on login.

title: Lite-Brite
oneLine: Fun Vanilla JavaScript project with childhood pointillism design.
detail: A fun, creative project. I saw the cool stickers and wanted to use them for a project but didn't know for what. Eventually remembered Lite-Brite was a thing, so the idea came to recreate a scene reminiscent of childhood.

title: danbennett.dev V3
detail: Personal website with crisper cards, animations and dark mode.

title: More Than Last Time
detail: More Than Last Time(MTLT) Fitness Tracker. My first full-stack Angular project that included NGXS state management, NestJS and Mongoose. Note - test data available on login limited to roughly exersizes, use Barbell/ Squat(Back) or Dumbbell/Bench Press as recognized 'last time exercises

title: Guess Who
oneLine: First major React project recreating the lengendary board game.
detail: I wanted to build my first project in React and I remembered it came to me that I hadn't played "Guess Who" in years...ahhh nostalgia will make you do extraordary things...

title: EV Charging
detail: After completing a couple fun and retro projects I wanted to display a darker, cleaner project, showcasing my improvement in overall design, organization and skills with leaflet and scrollspy

detail: Redesigned personal website to practice React

title: Turbo Beat
oneLine: Beat and synth mixer using Web Audio API.

detail: Redesigned personal website to practice React

title: Cashamole
lessonsLearned: Be aware of deployment limitations, for instance started with NestJS version 10, however, NameCheap only supports up to Node 14 and needed to downgrade NestJS to version 9.
Have smaller, more precise project ideas unless I want to spend a6 months+ working on a startup
